name: The Harrowing Dungeon Android
description:
I removed the application quit buttons and added button presses for movement so it works on Android mobile now. 

This game was developed over the course of a week. I used CC0 assets or my own assets only for the art and sounds. In this game, you explore a dangerous dungeon in which every step you take causes you to lose health. You have to find the way out before dying from exhaustion or from the various monsters that can be found in the dungeon.
